javascript: Strong understanding of modern JavaScript (ES6+), including asynchronous programming, Promises, async/await, DOM manipulation and functional programming patterns. Experienced in building interactive UI components and API-driven applications.
typescript: Confident in using TypeScript for type-safe, scalable applications. Experienced with interfaces, generics, type narrowing and integrating TypeScript in React and Node.js projects.
react: Skilled in building modern frontend applications using React, hooks, component architecture, context API, React Router and Redux Toolkit. Experience with form handling (react-hook-form), modals, validation and responsive UI.
html: Excellent knowledge of semantic HTML5, accessibility fundamentals and structuring clean, maintainable markup for complex layouts.
css: Strong skills in CSS3, including Flexbox, Grid, responsive design, animations and modern layout techniques. Able to create clean, scalable and visually consistent UI components.
sass: Experienced with Sass for writing modular, maintainable and reusable styles. Confident with variables, mixins, nesting and structuring scalable styling architectures.
nodejs: Experience working with Node.js to build backend logic, handle file systems, environment configuration, asynchronous operations and server-side JavaScript execution.
express: Skilled in building RESTful APIs with Express. Experience with routing, middleware, authentication, validation, error handling and creating modular backend architectures.
mysql: Experience with relational database design, Sequelize ORM, migrations, associations and writing optimized queries.
postgresql: Basic understanding of PostgreSQL and relational data modeling.
mongodb: Practical experience using MongoDB with Mongoose for flexible document-based data structures in full-stack applications.
git: Daily use of Git for version control. Skilled in branching, merging, resolving conflicts and maintaining clean commit histories in collaborative development environments.
github: Experienced with GitHub for repository hosting, pull requests, code reviews, project boards and team collaboration workflows.
docker: Good understanding of containerizing applications with Docker, creating Dockerfiles and using Docker Compose for full-stack environments.
linux: Solid Linux user with real experience from system administration. Confident in working with the terminal, file structure, permissions and environment configuration.
soft_skills: Strong problem-solving abilities, high attention to detail, reliable teamwork, fast learning, and structured working style.
